Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative of the city of New York, in relation to eliminating self-certification of plans submitted to the department of buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Eliminating self-certification of plans submitted to DOB.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to imposing sanctions upon professional engineers and registered architects that self-certify false or noncompliant building permit applications or plans.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Imposing sanctions upon professional engineers and registered architects that self-certify false or noncompliant building permit applications or plans.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the probation of professional engineers and registered architects.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Probation of professional engineers and registered architects.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to sanctioning professional engineers and registered architects who knowingly or negligently professionally certify a false or noncompliant building permit application or plans.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a database of professional engineers and architects who self-certify false or noncompliant building permit applications or plans.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative of the city of New York, in relation to eliminating self-certification of plans submitted to the department of buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Eliminating self-certification of plans submitted to DOB.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to imposing sanctions upon professional engineers and registered architects that self-certify false or noncompliant building permit applications or plans.

Items.MatterName: Imposing sanctions upon professional engineers and registered architects that self-certify false or noncompliant building permit applications or plans.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the probation of professional engineers and registered architects.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to sanctioning professional engineers and registered architects who knowingly or negligently professionally certify a false or noncompliant building permit application or plans.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a database of professional engineers and architects who self-certify false or noncompliant building permit applications or plans.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Nelson, Vacca, McMahon, James and Martinez
